SELECT wi.id, wi.CODE, wi.NAME, wi.quantity, wi.transaction_type, wi.create_date, wi.unit_price, wi.inbound_order_number, wi.delivery_order_number,
mi.NAME AS materialsName, mi.model, mi.images AS materialsImages, mi.type, mi.measurement_unit, FROM warehouse_info wi LEFT JOIN materials_info mi ON (mi.`code` = wi.`code`) WHERE 1 = 1 AND wi.transaction_type = 0 ORDER BY wi.create_date DESC
